education.description: Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Thesis on 'Deep Learning Applications in Natural Language Processing'.
Graduated with honors. Minor in Mathematics.

description: Lead a team of 5 engineers developing cloud-based solutions
Implemented microservices architecture using Kubernetes and Docker
Reduced system latency by 40% through optimization of database queries
Developed CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions
Developed features for Microsoft Azure cloud platform
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software
Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers
Developed features for the Facebook Messenger platform
Implemented real-time notification system using React and GraphQL
Collaborated with product managers and designers to refine feature requirements
